Availability and Clientele of OASAS-Certified Opioid Treatment Providers

in New York City, March 2019-2020

Number of admitted patients in opioid treatment centers

and their reported zip codes

OASAS-certified opioid treatment provider availability

No provider available

6-104

At least one provider available

East Harlem (south)

Of the patients that are treated in zip codes across Harlem,

only 59% report coming from a zip code in the area.

West Harlem

East Harlem

Only 22% of NYC zip codes have treatment providers,

and 54% of admitted patients do not have a provider in their zip code.

Source: Freedom of Information Law Request made by Shawn Hill.

Admission to Office of Addiction Services and Supports (OASAS)‐certified Overdose Prevention and Opioid Treatment Programs in New York City by Zip Code of Residence.

Centers with only 1-5 patients from a specific zip code had admissions data redacted to protect patient confidentiality.

The zip codes here considered in and near Harlem are: 10031, 10030, 10037, 10027,10026, 10035, 10029, 10039.

Graphic by Adina Cazacu-De Luca
